Plot: Scientist hold talking, super-intelligent babies captive, but things take a turn for the worse when a mix-up occurs between a baby genius and its twin.
Title: Baby Geniuses
Writer: Steven Paul (story), Francisca Matos (story), Robert Grasmere (story), Bob Clark (screenplay), Greg Michael (screenplay)
Actors: Kathleen Turner, Christopher Lloyd, Kim Cattrall, Peter MacNicol
tomatoConsensus: Flat direction and actors who look embarrassed to be onscreen make Baby Geniuses worse than the premise suggests.
